info.name: Firefox 11 + Change image view background
info.description: Recently, Firefox (Nightly) introduced some changes to how single images are displayed on a page. This code will allow you to put any color you want on the background. Plus, some simple shadow if you want to.
info.additionalInfo:
Known issues:
- case sensitivity of URLs
- images that are served without an explicit URL

as of 2012-01-12

data.title: Works great, Note: The image view background change also appears on Fx(Aurora) 11.0a2
